sentences: She is based in Ottawa, Ontario.
Since 1987 she has played her original songs in hundreds of venues in four countries including forty-seven US states.

Since 1987 she has played her original songs in hundreds of venues in four countries including forty-seven US states. Anderson first began touring the U.S. in 1987, and released her debut album in 1989.
She was voted Favorite New Performer by Hot Wire in 1990 and 1991, and played many women's music festivals through the decade of the 1990s through today.
Anderson's memoir, Drive All Night, was published in 2014.
Her second book, An Army of Lovers: Womenâ€™s Music of the Seventies and Eighties, was published in 2019.
